stimulusHtml: The way the human form is idealized in the grave stele of Hegeso is most characteristic of which of the following ancient Greek art periods?
choicesHtml: Archaic as seen in the Peplos Kore from the Acropolis
Hellenistic as seen in the Winged Victory of Samothrace
Classical as seen in the Plaque of the Ergastines
Archaic as seen in the Anavysos Kouros
